name: Egg Catcher - Catch The Chocolate Edition
name_original: Egg Catcher - Catch The Chocolate Edition
description:
Egg Catcher - Catch the Chocolate Edition!

Catch the eggs before they fall to the ground! This game is a hyper-casual game with endless time, your mission here is just to challenge you and your friends to see who gets the best score! And remember, if you lose one egg then it's game over! 

Please post your score in the comments!

Developed by

Caio Varalta - Sound Designer, Composer, Game Designer.

Gabriel Dias - Game Designer, Programmer, Graphic Designer.

Genre 

Hypercasual!

Controls

Mouse - Click on buttons!

Left Arrow - Move the Basket to the Left.

Right Arrow - Move the Basket to the Right.

Keyboard - Write your name on the score menu!

Contacts

LINKTREE - Caio Varalta

TWITTER - Gabriel Dias

Bugs

If you find some bugs or the game is crashing, put in the comments and I will repair that! I tried to look for everything, but I still don't know if something can happen in the middle of the way!

Thank you so much for playing Egg Catcher - Catch the Chocolate Edition!

If you are a gamer, a streamer, a YouTuber, or even someone that wants to have a little working in games experience as a Tester, please let me know! Thank you so much!

Thanks to

Asymmetric and his pixel art assets!

Every asset of this game that is pixel art was made by Asymmetric!
